newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss company bankruptcies up 7.5 pct in Jan-May.
newsitem.headline: Swiss company bankruptcies up 7.5 pct in Jan-May.

text.p: Swiss commercial bankruptcies rose 7.5 percent from January through end-May compared with the same period in 1996.

Schweizerischer Verband Creditreform, a bureau that gives banks information on the creditworthiness of borrowers, said 1,823 commercial bankruptcy proceedings had been registered in the first five months of the year compared with 1,697 in the same 1996 period.
Including non-firm bankruptcy proceedings, total bankruptcy cases fell 2.5 percent to 3,874.
